title: Podcast 346: How to manage your mental health when a relationship changes or ends
description:

EPISODE DESCRIPTION: In this podcast I talk about how to manage your mental health when a relationship changes or ends.

Read the show blog here: https://drleaf.com/blogs/news/relationships-ending

4:30 Why relationships change

5:15 Some relationships are seasonal

6:30, 18:25 Why it is okay when relationships change or end
